description.value:
You summon the Light of Goetia, all that is left of the former Maestro of the Symphony.

Light of Ishuala Goetia Speed 100 feet, Fly 50 feet Arrive (Teleportation) Ishuala's Graviton The space around all creatures within 60 feet begins to warble and shake. Enemy creatures need to make a Fortitude saving throw, while willing allies in the field can automatically Succeed on the saving throw if they so choose.

Critical Success A creature is unaffected, and cannot be swapped with another creature.

Success The creature is swapped with another creature who Succeeds on their save or worse. A willing ally can choose to be moved to an empty space as well. You decide who is moved to where.

Failure As success, but the creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2}.

Critical Failure As success, but the creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 4}.

Departure Ishuala's Flow The space around Goetia becomes distorted as time flows differently for each creature. Each creature needs to succeed at a Will save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 2} for 1 round (and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 minute on a critical failure).
